teams.name: Hornfels
teams.about1: Hornfels acts as the primary point of contact for astronauts embarking on missions. They provide essential guidance, updates, and support from the ground, ensuring the safety and success of space explorations.
teams.about2: Hornfels is responsible for curating and maintaining the Outer Wilds Ventures Museum. This involves collecting artifacts, documenting the history of the space program, and presenting it in an informative and engaging manner to educate new astronauts and visitors.
teams.about3: As one of the founding members of Outer Wilds Ventures, Hornfels has been instrumental in shaping the space program's direction and success through their leadership and vision.
teams.collaborations: Works closely with Slate, the engineer, to improve and upgrade spacecraft and instrumentation based on mission data and astronaut feedback.
achievements: Improved spacecraft user experience
Enhanced navigation tools
Successful documentation and preservation of space program history
teams.funFact: Hornfels has a keen interest in ancient Nomai technology and often spends their free time studying it.

teams.name: Slate
teams.about1: Slate is the engineer responsible for building and maintaining the spacecraft used by Outer Wilds Ventures.
teams.about2: They are known for their innovative designs and hands-on approach to problem-solving.
teams.about3: Slate is resourceful and has a casual, friendly demeanor, often seen providing last-minute advice to astronauts before launch.
teams.collaborations: Works closely with Hornfels to implement improvements and upgrades based on mission feedback.
achievements: Designed and built the Outer Wilds spacecraft
Developed advanced navigation systems
Implemented safety features for astronaut missions
teams.funFact: Slate loves tinkering with gadgets and often invents new tools in their spare time.

teams.name: Gossan
teams.about1: Gossan is the flight instructor and zero-g coach, and one of the founding members of Outer Wilds Ventures.
teams.about2: Gossan is missing an eye and part of their left ear. They used to pilot a ship as well and during their first trip crashed into the moon.
teams.about3: They clash with Slate the engineer over safety features for the spaceships.
teams.collaborations: Works closely with the player to provide guidance on flight maneuvers and zero-g navigation.
achievements: Provided flight training to numerous astronauts
Helped develop safety protocols for space missions
Discovered valuable insights through their own piloting experiences
teams.funFact: Gossan enjoys sharing stories of their adventures in space and providing practical tips for navigating zero-g environments.

teams.name: Feldspar
teams.about1: Feldspar is a legendary astronaut known for their adventurous spirit. They were the first Hearthian to explore deep space and are often regarded as a hero among their peers.
teams.about2: Brave and daring, Feldspar is driven by a thirst for adventure and discovery.
teams.about3: Feldspar's fearless approach to space exploration has led to many groundbreaking discoveries.
teams.collaborations: Works with the team to share knowledge from their deep space explorations, inspiring and guiding future missions.
achievements: First Hearthian to explore deep space
Discovered several unknown celestial bodies
Inspired generations of new astronauts
teams.funFact: Feldspar once survived a chase with three anglerfishes on Dark Bramble and lived to tell the tale.

teams.name: Gabbro
teams.about1: Gabbro is one of the astronauts who explores the solar system. They have a relaxed attitude and are often found meditating or playing their flute on Giant's Deep.
teams.about2: Gabbro enjoys the journey of exploration and often contemplates the mysteries of the universe.
teams.about3: Their easygoing and philosophical nature makes them a unique and insightful member of the Outer Wilds Ventures team.
teams.collaborations: Shares findings and insights from their explorations with the rest of the team, contributing to the overall knowledge base.
achievements: Discovered numerous unique phenomena on Giant's Deep
Provided critical data on the nature of time loops
Enhanced team understanding of the universe's mysteries
teams.funFact: Gabbro often meditates to the sound of ocean waves, finding peace and inspiration in their rhythms.

teams.name: Chert
teams.about1: Chert is stationed on Ember Twin, observing the stars and tracking astronomical events. They provide valuable data and insights about the solar system's celestial bodies.
teams.about2: Curious and meticulous, Chert is dedicated to their research and often gets lost in their observations.
teams.about3: Chert's passion for understanding the universe drives their tireless work and significant contributions.
teams.collaborations: Shares astronomical data with the team, aiding in the planning and execution of space missions.
achievements: Mapped significant portions of the solar system
Identified critical celestial events
Contributed to understanding the nature of time loops
teams.funFact: Chert enjoys stargazing with a cup of tea, finding the vastness of space both humbling and inspiring.

teams.name: Riebeck
teams.about1: Riebeck studies the ancient Nomai civilization. They explore ruins and decode artifacts to uncover the history and technology of the Nomai.
teams.about2: Thoughtful and slightly anxious, Riebeck is deeply committed to their archaeological work.
teams.about3: Riebeck's fascination with the past and its connections to the present makes them a key member of the Outer Wilds Ventures team.
teams.collaborations: Works with the team to interpret Nomai artifacts and integrate discoveries into the space program's knowledge base.
achievements: Uncovered significant Nomai artifacts
Decoded ancient Nomai texts
Provided insights into Nomai technology and history
teams.funFact: Riebeck can often be found sketching Nomai ruins in their journal, capturing the details of their explorations.

teams.name: Esker
teams.about1: Esker is stationed at the Lunar Lookout, where they keep an eye on the skies and monitor for any potential dangers or interesting phenomena.
teams.about2: They provide real-time updates and alerts to the team, ensuring the safety of missions.
teams.about3: Eskerâ€™s vigilance and keen observational skills make them a crucial part of the Outer Wilds Ventures.
teams.collaborations: Works with Chert to report astronomical events and with Hornfels to coordinate mission safety.
achievements: Alerted team to several potential hazards
Provided early warnings for celestial events
Helped coordinate successful mission launches
teams.funFact: Esker enjoys carving wooden sculptures during their downtime at the lookout.

teams.name: Hal
teams.about1: Hal made a significant discovery, which is the Nomai translator, unlocking a deeper understanding of the Nomai civilization and their technology.
teams.about2: Hal's dedication to the space program and meticulous attention to detail help ensure the success and safety of every mission.
teams.about3: Their passion for space exploration is infectious, making them a key motivator for the entire team.
teams.collaborations: Works closely with Slate to troubleshoot any technical issues and with Hornfels to ensure mission readiness.
achievements: Prepared numerous successful launches
Developed pre-launch checklists and protocols
Ensured the safety of multiple astronauts through diligent preparation
teams.funFact: Hal is known for their detailed knowledge of rocket science and enjoys explaining complex concepts in simple terms.
